messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: This is a critical General Election for our nation. Your vote will shape the future of Britain. For too long, craven politicians in Westminster have betrayed us, reneging on their 2017 manifesto promises. Johnson’s treaty ignores the 17.4 million people who voted to LEAVE; no ifs, no buts, no £39 billion payment, and no extended ‘transition’ period where we must continue to obey Brussels’ diktats. Labour wants a second referendum. While the Libdems would revoke Article 50 to lock us into the EU forever. You, the people of Holborn & St Pancras, deserve better! In this election, a vote for UKIP is a vote to honour the referendum result where we take back full control of our laws, borders, finances and trade. No more fudge judges or delays! Vote UKIP on December 12th, 2019 and send the Establishment a message they will never forget. Mohammad Ali Bhatti

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that Britain leaves the EU without further delay or extended transition periods.
Implement strict controls on immigration to reduce numbers significantly.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Put our NHS before Foreign Aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Redirect funds from foreign aid to support and improve the National Health Service.
Hold politicians accountable for their promises and actions.
Abolish the mandatory BBC licence fee, making it optional.
Prohibit slaughtering practices that do not involve stunning the animal first.
Promote and protect traditional British values and the right to free speech.
